title: Yellowstone star’s thriller fans say is ‘so good you won’t be able to stop’
description: A new spy thriller has just landed on Prime Video and viewers have been left in awe of the action-packed series.
content:
Prime Video has stealthily unleashed a captivating thriller series that possesses all the ingredients of a colossal success. The complete six-episode run of this adrenaline-fuelled drama landed yesterday (Wednesday, 13th August) and has already garnered rave reviews from viewers who've dived in. Featuring The Good Doctor and Lost icon Daniel Dae Kim alongside Yellowstone's Piper Perabo, Butterfly represents essential viewing for enthusiasts of gripping espionage drama. The mayhem also contains surprising depth as Kim's operative David Jung reconnects with his killer daughter Rebecca (portrayed by Reina Hardesty) in a heart-stopping game of cat and mouse spanning South Korea. Perabo embodies Juno, the chief of clandestine intelligence organisation Caddis and Jung's former ally, who dispatches her most lethal assassins on a quest to eliminate him, reports the Mirror.

Whilst the series hasn't yet soared up the rankings, it's merely a question of time and viewers have the opportunity to join the excitement before it potentially transforms into one of Prime Video's most discussed fresh offerings. Simply consider these delighted audiences who unanimously believe Butterfly merits binge-watching this week. Television critic Klepcx concurred: "@PrimeVideo's live-action adaptation of the 2014 @boomstudios comic #Butterflyseries elevates its main characters by creating an original world of colorful villains and espionage.

"By taking its own liberties through a narrative slow burn, Butterfly still manages to entertain through its action sequences, high stakes, suspense, and a major plot-twisting ending!" Another enthusiast chimed in: "Butterfly is the best new show I have seen in a long time. Must watch. I do warn you, if you start it, have time to binge all 6 episodes." One glowing five-star review on Google stated: "Butterfly is a phenomenal show IMHO! It has the soul of the Bourne series, but with its own unique identity.
summary: Prime Video has released a six-episode thriller series, Butterfly, featuring Daniel Dae Kim and Piper Perabo. The series has received rave reviews and is expected to become a significant addition to Prime Video's offerings. The drama, which focuses on Kim's character and his daughter, involves a game of cat and mouse across South Korea. Despite not yet reaching the top five, viewers are encouraged to binge-watch the series.
shortSummary: Prime Video's "Butterfly" thriller, starring Daniel Dae Kim and Piper Perabo, has received rave reviews and is poised for success despite its slow progression.

argos_summary: Prime Video has released a new thriller series titled 'Butterfly,' featuring Daniel Dae Kim and Piper Perabo, which has received positive reviews from viewers. The six-episode series follows Kim's character, David Jung, as he navigates a dangerous game of cat and mouse with his assassin daughter, set against a backdrop of espionage in South Korea. Critics praise the show for its engaging action sequences and character development, suggesting it could become a major hit for the platform.
